text: Everything about it. The menu didn t have a good vegetarian vegan option which made it hard for me to have proper meals although the chef did go out of his way to make me something

Bathroom bed view staff was lovely Location was great. More vegetarian vegan gluten free options please Also my husbands chicken Kiev was swimming with oil and my chicken and avocado salad was nothing but fatty chicken and smothered with vinegar Please improve
Great location near everything but still quiet Very friendly and helpful staff Great city for vegan travellers
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices
A very enjoyable stay and lovely staff. I wish there were more vegan options for breakfast other than just fruit
The rooms were good the bathroom was lovely it was peaceful and spacious. No vegan options for food no lock on bathroom doors
The location and helpfulness of the staff was great. There was no vegan choices for breakfast and we felt that that was a waste of money Other than that all good
Convenient to ExCel Bed very comfortable. Pricey paid parking Food very poor value especially evening grill bar No vegan choice even though requested

A nice location easy walking distance to metro bars restaurants Notre Dame and Jardins Luxembourg Safe provided Room size OK Nice artwork decorations. Limited vegan choice for breakfast no milk alternatives and no fresh fruit
I m vegan Had soy milk for coffee That s the best I got For anyone else could fit The room smelld a bit weird The crue was very kind
Everything was excellent the accommodation the personnel the breakfast love the fruits and vegan options of milk the location 5 minute relaxing walk from the Dome

Very good hotel at a very reasonable price I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this hotel Very friendly and helpful staff wonderful sauna and fitness area great location delicious breakfast relatively good selection of vegan options for breakfast
The most comfortable bed in a hotel ever Really friendly and helpful staff Fantastic location for exploring Paris Great breakfast with tons of options including for vegan

Staff was very welcoming and professional Breakfast was great and healthy loved it Even thought of vegan people Hotel is walking distance from a metro and only 3 stops from Duomo It is also near Centrale Station approx 15min walk

Good location not far from Wimbledon centre funny organic Vegan cafe. Old building oddly shaped rooms barely usable shower my room was on the top floor under an angled roof the only way to use the shower was to squat in the tub

Friendly and competent staff well designed and thought through rooms outstanding roof top restaurant and terrace request for vegan breakfast has been fulfilled. Noise early morning through heavy room doors closed by guests without taking care of others still sleeping
Waffle machine for making it yourself with loads of syrup Comfy beds and nice staff. Vegans should ask the staff for soy milk Gym has mainly cardio machines only
It is an amazing hotel I loved everything location comfort services friendliness of the staff and vegan options on the menu One of the best hotels I have stayed in Paris will definitely come back

The room facilities were excellent and the bed was very comfortable Great shower Very clean Staff very helpful and friendly. No view from window Expected better bread selection from a hotel in Vienna Vegan options limited

Lovely customer service Yanka if i m not wrong and Maria from reception were very helpful Thank you. Could have more options for vegan diet not only for gluten free And employees should know better the menu Lovely people though
